content.rendered:
Happy New Year! Can you believe that 2018 is here? With the new year that brings new opportunities to meet you at a variety of tradeshows located throughout the world.  You can find us at veterinary shows, consumer shows and industry specific shows as both exhibitors and attendees.  Below is our current list of events but please check our Facebook page often for an updated schedule.

January

International Embryo Technology Society (IETS) in Bangkok, Thailand, Jan 13-16, 2018.

February

Veterinary Meeting & Expo (VMX, formerly NAVC) in Orlando, Florida, Feb 4-7, 2018. Stop by booth 2428 and visit with a special guest!

Amazing Pet Expo in Las Vegas, Nevada, Feb 10-11, 2018.  Come see a special guest!

March

Western Veterinary Conference in Las Vegas, Nevada, Mar 5-7, 2018. Stop by booth 2836 and meet a special guest!

April

BlogPaws in Kansas City, Missouri, Apr 18-20, 2018.  Visit with ViaGen Pets and I Party With Bruce Wayne!

Amazing Pet Expo South Florida, Apr 21-22, 2018.

June

World Dog Expo in Secaucus, New Jersey, Jun 9-10, 2018.

July

Working Dog Conference in Saint Louis, Missouri, Jul 15-18, 2018.

American Veterinarian Medical Association (AVMA) in Denver, Colorado, Jul 13-17, 2018.  Dr. Kerry Ryan, DVM, will be presenting alongside Dr. Shawn Walker.

August

CatCon in Pasadena, California, Aug 4-5, 2018.

September

Amazing Pet Expo Bay Area, Sep 8-9, 2018.

If we don’t happen to be attending a show close to your home please call us to learn more at 888-876-6104. We hope to meet you soon!

By: Lauren
